column4: hi can anyone tell me of a lightweight minimalistic music player that plays CDs as well?
I dont know about LightWeight, but I really like Exaile. It's got a plugin for mini mode, dunno if that's what you are looking for
i've tried exaile not what i am looking for, going to look in the repo im sure alsa has a lightweight cd player not sure only used it once before a long time ago
Thingymebob: I think it was alsaplayer looking at the screenshots I think that is what it was will try it and yeah tried audacious i need soemthing even more minimal :p
